author: colm
msg: Logresolve style and nit fix-ups:
* Remove some redundant whitespace in variable declarations.
* Add some whitespace for clarity around an if and a while statement.
* Remove redundant and unneccessary casts
* Use APR_HASH_KEY_STRING

author: mbo
msg: JDO-181: add method setRange(String) to QueryImpl class.
The current implementation throws an exception, but with this change
QueryImpl compiles against the current JDO2 API (api20).

author: cziegeler
msg: Clean up Castor handling

author: dreid
msg: - make dr.pl output the correct filenames now
- adjust the xsl so we get only the html and not other junk we don't need
- add a first pass at generating a full site from the files, incuding indexing
and a nav bar.
I realise that people will hate this as it uses frames but it's a first pass
and gives nice easy to use navigation between the various index pages and
the project details. I'm sure those who know such things can improve on it
dramatically :-)
Also, I've made a small stab at getting the layout looking better, but it's
nowhere near finished yet.
I also need to get multi-layer indexes working. shouldn't be hard, just needs some
extra bits of code adding to indexer.pl.
